content: CRITICAL: Debug endless 'Processing...' state in Assessment Part 1 completion
Frontend-agent: Analyze ImportanceForm submission and processing state logic
Backend-agent: Validate Firebase operations and data persistence in assessment flow
Testing-agent: Validate complete assessment flow and identify blocking points
Examine navigation logic from importance ratings to next step
Investigate async operations in handleSubmit that could cause hanging
Implement targeted fixes for identified async operation issues
Create comprehensive testing plan to validate fix effectiveness
